snippet.title: Tales of Grimace Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Tales of Grimace is an indie RPG published by CRX ENTERTAINMENT coming to Nintendo Switch and PC Q1 of 2025.
Play the demo at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2223310/Tales_of_Grimace/
Follow the Tales of Grimace Social Media
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61563844233175
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/talesofgrimaceofficial/
Tik Tok: https://www.tiktok.com/@talesofgrimaceofficial?is_from_webapp=1&sender_device=pc

Let the show begin!

In a far of land called Terra…
Tensions are beginning to rise…
People, everywhere, are dictated by their beliefs and religion, killing pushing away anyone who disagrees with them…
The biggest of them being the Maluum, an evil cult hell-bent on making everyone share their beliefs.
Anyone who resists them faces the same fate: death. Those who oppose them are known as obstainers, people who resist the evil religion.
But for our hero Yi Ping…
It was just another quiet day with his friend Hera…
In a little town called Kelna.

Yi Ping is a teenage boy whose life is forever changed when his small town is attacked by an evil cult known as the Maluum. Who is this strange cult? What mysteries are they hiding? And is Yi Ping more closely connected to them than he thinks?
Join Yi Ping and his friends on an epic quest to free Terra from the Maluum’s evil grip and experience a heart-touching story about a young boy conquering his anxiety and depression.
Tales Of Grimace is a mature, traditional RPG where you:
• Explore the vast region of Terra and its amazing landscapes;
• Meet a cast of interesting characters that are relevant to the story;
• Discover the mysteries behind a main character tormented by his past.
